info.title: Product API
info.description: Handles all product definitions and rule sets related to products, SIC codes and global rules.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all products.

Requires the products_reader permission to access.

post.description:
Create a new product.

Requires the products_writer permission to access.

questions.label: Data Protection and Disclosure Declaration
questions.fieldText: Before proceeding, please confirm that Scheme's signed Data Protection and Disclosure Declaration has been received

questions.label: Sic code
questions.fieldText: Which Standard Indudtrial Classification (SIC) code from the UK SIC 2007 best describes the busness sector in which the guaranteed facility will be used?

questions.label: Company annual turnover
questions.fieldText: What is the current (or where none,forcast) annual turnover of the Applicant (or, if the Applicant is a Group Company, the aggregate Group turnover)?

questions.label: Turnover by trading activity
questions.fieldText: Is (or will) more than 50% of the above turnover be generated by trading activity?

questions.label: Commencement of trading date
questions.fieldText: What is the commencement of trading date of the Applicant business?

questions.label: Postcode of where the facility will be used
questions.helpText: Use the postcode lookup to check you have the correct postcode, you do not need to select an exact address

questions.label: Sort code
questions.fieldText: What is the Sort Code of the bank branch or business centre which originated this application?

questions.label: Lender reference
questions.fieldText: Enter your own reference for this application, eg the reference of the loan facility

questions.label: Facility Total
questions.fieldText: What is the overall facility to be provided?

questions.label: Repayment profile
questions.fieldText: Repayment profile

questions.label: Principal Purpose
questions.fieldText: What is the principal purpose for which the scheme facility will be used for

responseOptionValues.responseValue: Purchasing licences quotas or other entitlements to trade
Acquiring another business within the UK
Acquiring another business outside the UK – Ineligible
Expanding an existing business within the UK
Expanding an existing business outside the UK – Ineligible

questions.label: Rate
questions.fieldText: Please indicate whether the interest on this facility is to be charged at a fixed or variable rate

questions.label: Applicant's de minimis State aid (past 3 years)
questions.fieldText: Is the total value of the applicant's (or if the Applicant is a Group Company, the relevant Group's) de minimis State aid for the last three years (including that arising from this application) less than 200,000 euro?

questions.label: Total value of fees
questions.fieldText: Please enter the total value of any arrangement, insurance or other fees (but excluding interest and the EFG Guarantee Fee) the Applicant will be charged in connection with this facility being provided

questions.label: Principal type of asset
questions.fieldText: Please select the principal type of asset over which a charge has been taken to provide the partial security

responseOptionValues.responseValue: Residential Property other than a principal private residence
Plant, machinery or other business equipment
Personal vehicle, boat or other asset
Personal life insurance or other policy

questions.label: Value of additional security
questions.fieldText: For the purpose of this lending decision, what value is assigned to the additional security taken?

questions.label: string
questions.fieldText: string

questions.label: Offer date
questions.fieldText: once the facility has been offered to the borrower, please add the date the offer letter was issued.

questions.label: Information declaration
questions.fieldText: The borrower has signed and returned the information declaration

questions.label: Guarantee fee payment confirmation
questions.fieldText: Confirm borrower ability to make guarantee fee payment

get.description:
Fetches a single product, including its currently active set of rules.

Requires the product_reader permission to access.

put.description:
Updates a products definition.

Requires the products_writer permission to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a product from the system.

Requires the product_remover permission to access.

get.summary: Get all rules for a programme
get.description:
Get a paginated list of all rule sets in the system for a programme. Can use a date to search for the active rule sets.

Requires the product_reader permission to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all rule sets.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to use to query for active rule sets on that date.

post.description:
Create a new rule set.

Requires the product_writer permission to access.

get.description:
Get a single rule set for a programme.

Requires the product_reader permission to access.

put.description:
Update a rule.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a rule set.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a paginated list of all SIC codes.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all SIC codes.

post.description:
Add a new SIC code to the system.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single SIC code.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a SIC code.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Removes a SIC code from the system.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all programmes.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all results.

post.description:
Create a new programme on the system.

Requires the products_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get a single programme.

Requires the products_reader permission to access.

put.description:
Updates a programme.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Delete a programme.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description: Get principal purposes for a programme

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

status.description: Active or Inactive - only one ruleset should ever be active within the same date range.

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.
